module.name: Misc Applications
module.description: Adds the ability to create feature codes that can go to any FreePBX destination (such as an IVR or queue)
module.changelog: *0.2.3* #1902 miscapp always sets/pulls default code now regardless of custom override in featurecodes *0.2.2* added SQLite3 support, fixes http://freepbx.org/trac/ticket/1775 *0.2.1.1* changed freePBX to FreePBX *0.2.1* merge findmefollow/core extension destinations if any *0.2* Fix bug with adding new apps *0.1.1* Fixed publish location for trunk/2.3 repository
